website_summaries.verdict: Like other Power Rangers, its stickers tend to peel off, but this Bull Megazord is a favorite of kids regardless.
pros: A huge, foot-tall Zord that stands as a toy on its own or can be combined with others in the Megazord set
Morphs from robot to bull Zord and back again
Sturdily built, holding up to daily playtime
cons: Pricier than other Zords but essential to completing the Gigazord
Stickers tend to curl and peel off easily

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong but it’s lame.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is but the transformation is weak and it’s pretty boring overall. I’m sure when combined with the other toys in the series it’s cool but held 7 yr olds attention for all of a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nevermind

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this as an addition to his other zords
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these zords. The newer generation ones aren't made quite as well as this one, but they do all fit together still. The Gosei Megazord is newer and doesn't hold up quite as well as the samurai, claw and bull megazords. My son doesn't seem to mind or notice but I do. All in all a great toy, along with all the other zords and would recommend. Shipping was on time.
customer_reviews.author: ari939

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: cool kids toy. seems durable to after being slamed around right away. hasnt broke yet

customer_reviews.title: great.
customer_reviews.text: My six year old loves power rangers and has most of the zords. He's been collecting them for about two years, and hasn't had a single one break on him. these are quality toys that do so much. you can play with each one by itself, and they also all come apart and attach to each other. you can build bigger, cooler zords using your imagination, or follow the instructions to make it look like the ones on the package. My son has spent so much time playing with these, and they never seem to get old.

customer_reviews.title: My son is hooked!

These toys can build onto each other and the completed one my 7 year old builds with umpteen sets of this and that is taller than his waist! Really cool to watch my sons imagination grow with the toy too. I'm not really a fan of the power rangers (like my son is, I prefer the Lego stuff) but I will admit I get into playing with these zord things when my son and I play together.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for my five-year old son, who already had the rest of the Power Ranger Samurai zords. He has played with it everyday for the last two weeks and enjoys it immensely. While the instructions for making the GigaZord were a bit confusing at first, we were able to construct it together with a little bit of patience. The first time took about 20 minutes to figure out all the combinations, but now he is able to combine all 11 zords, plus add in the SharkZord and LightZord, in about 3-5 minutes. It's a great toy if your child loves Power Rangers, and I feel it helps him learn patience and practice.

product_meta.title: Power Rangers Megazord Bull Megazord
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 The Bandai Power Rangers Bull Megazord warrior toy faithfully captures the awesome power of the giant transforming samurai robot featured in Power Rangers. This colorful and impressively statured figure offers two transformation modes, allowing kids to play with the toy as a samurai robot or rampaging bull. Or, they can combine it with other Zord vehicles and figures to create the Ultrazord (each sold separately). With its extending legs, rotating shoulder blasters, oversize Gatling cannon, and six wheels, the Bull Megazord offers mighty morphin' fun for ages four and up.

Megazord stands over 1 foot tall in samurai mode. View larger.CHANGES FROM SAMURAI ROBOT TO BULL MEGAZORD
 The Bull Megazord comes as a sleek samurai robot warrior, but can quickly be transformed into the impressive Bull Megazord. In its robot form, the figure stands over 1 foot tall and is enhanced by moveable arms, rotating shoulder-mounted blasters, and an attachable Gatling cannon accessory that can be held in either hand or stored on its waist.

 When it's time for the samurai robot to charge into battle, the figure transforms into the ferocious Bull Megazord complete with golden bull horns. In just a few easy steps, kids can rotate the arms, extend the legs and head, and flip the figure over to allow it to roll on its six wheels for a piercing attack.

COMBINE WITH OTHER FIGURES TO CREATE ULTRAZORD
 For enhanced fun, the Bull Megazord can be combined with select Power Rangers Zord vehicles and figures to create the ultimate weapon--the Ultrazord (each sold separately). Choose from a variety of items in the ZordBuilder Collection and snap them to the Bull Megazord's body to create your own unique hero. For guidance, a step-by-step instruction sheet is included demonstrating a variety of figure combinations.

 This figure is not as sophisticated as some other transforming robots on the market, and its articulation is limited--only its arms rotate. However, the transformation process is easy to accomplish as kids need only rotate the arms into position, pull the legs out, and extend the figure's head forward to change the basic configuration. Because of its ease of use and imaginative design, the Bull Megazord makes for a versatile toy to play with and relive your favorite Power Rangers moments.

ABOUT POWER RANGERS
 Appealing to a global audience since 1993, Power Rangers has become an international phenomenon. Airing in more than 40 markets worldwide and offering more than 700 episodes to date, the show emphasizes the importance of teamwork, personal responsibility, physical fitness, and helping those in need. Power Rangers chronicles the exciting adventures of ordinary young people who morph into extraordinary superheroes to work together in solving challenges.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 Power Rangers Megazord Bull Megazord, Gatling cannon, and instructions.

AT A GLANCE:
 * Bull Megazord offers two play modes
 * Morphs from samurai warrior to Bull Megazord
 * Can be combined with additional figures in ZordBuilder Collection (sold separately)
 * Includes rotating shoulder blasters and Gatling cannon 
 * Stands over 1 foot tall in samurai mode

AGE/WEIGHT REQUIREMENTS:
 * Four years and up

ASSEMBLY REQUIREMENTS:
 * No assembly required

Bull Megazord morphs from samurai warrior to Bull Megazord. View larger.
feature_bullets: The Power Rangers iconic Megazord comes in a sleek Samurai look!
Morph with items in the ZordBuilder collection (sold separately)
